text: Karuppu Maya Thevar (15 October 1934 â€“ 9 August 2022) was an Indian politician. He was a Member of Parliament for the Lok Sabha from Tamil Nadu from 1973 to 1984."AIADMK-DMK direct fight in four Dindigul constituencies", The Hindu, 18 April 2006 He was born in Usilampatti, then-British India. He was a member of the All India Anna Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam. Thevar died on 9 August 2022 in Chinnalapatti, India from cardiac arrest at the age of 87. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Tamil Nadu politicians Category:Members of the Lok Sabha Category:All India Anna Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam politicians
title: Maya Thevar
